data.title: Drew Sidora to Grace the Stage at the Black Business Ball in Minneapolis, MN
data.meta_description: The Black Business Ball, an annual event celebrating black-owned businesses and fostering empowerment within the community, is thrilled to announce that actress, singer, and entrepreneur Drew Sidora will be gracing the stage for a live musical performance at this year's gala. Drew Sidora, recognized
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Drew Sidora, recognized for her versatile talents in the entertainment industry, is set to bring her exceptional musical prowess to the Black Business Ball. Known for her roles in hit films like "Step Up" and "CrazySexyCool: The TLC Story," as well as her current role on "The Real Housewives of Atlanta," Sidora is no stranger to captivating audiences.

Sidora's live performance is expected to be one of the highlights of the event. In addition to her accomplishments in the entertainment industry, Drew Sidora is an entrepreneur and advocate for empowering individuals and communities. Her dedication to uplifting others aligns perfectly with the mission of the Black Business Ball.

"We are honored to have Drew Sidora grace our event with her incredible talent," said Nancy Korsah , CEO and Founder of Black Business Enterprises . "This event not only celebrates entrepreneurship but also highlights the strength and resilience of black-owned businesses, here in Minneapolis and St. Paul."

The Black Business Ball is a highly anticipated annual event organized by Black Business Enterprises Fund (BBE), a 501(c)(3) tax-exempt organization dedicated to supporting entrepreneurs, small businesses, and individuals striving to improve their financial well-being. With a mission to uplift, recognize, and spotlight black-owned businesses, this event serves as a fundraiser and networking opportunity to forge meaningful relationships within the community.

The Black Business Ball is an annual event dedicated to celebrating and supporting black-owned businesses. It serves as a platform to uplift and recognize entrepreneurs, foster economic empowerment, and advance financial literacy within the black community. The event brings together a diverse group of individuals, businesses, and organizations committed to making a lasting impact in the world of business.

Drew Sidora is a multifaceted talent known for her work as an actress, singer, and entrepreneur. With a career spanning both film and television, Sidora has captivated audiences with her exceptional performances. Her live performance at the Black Business Ball is highly anticipated, adding a touch of musical magic to the event.
